snippet: The review by the office of Eric T. Schneiderman will include whether Ariel Galarza, who died on Wednesday, was armed when a police officer used an electric stun gun on him....
abstract: New York Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman's office opens investigation into death of Bronx man Ariel Galarza, who was shocked twice with stun gun by police sergeant; move is sanctioned by Gov Andrew M Cuomo's 2015 executive order allowing attorney general to prosecute cases of unarmed civilians killed by police.
lead_paragraph: The review by the office of Eric T. Schneiderman will include whether Ariel Galarza, who died on Wednesday, was armed when a police officer used an electric stun gun on him.

headline.main: New York Attorney General to Investigate Taser Death of Bronx Man
headline.print_headline: New York to Review Bronx Man’s Taser Death
